item.title: Climate Change and Natural Disasters: The Direst Predictions
item.description: Natural disasters seem to be on the rise, and many are wondering if climate change is the main cause. While it’s not the only factor, climate change is certainly exacerbating the problem. In this blog post, we’ll explore how climate change is making natural disasters worse than our direst predictions.
